sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Card from '../components/Card'; import Badge from '../components/Badge'; const Blog = () => { const featuredPosts = [ { id: 1, title: 'The Power of Language Learning in a Globalized World', excerpt: 'Explore how mastering new languages opens doors to international opportunities and cultural understanding.', image: '/Images/blog-1.jpg', date: 'March 15, 2024', author: 'Flency Atswenje', category: 'Language Learning', }, { id: 2, title: 'Student Spotlight: Journey to Fluency', excerpt: 'Inspiring success stories from our students who transformed their language skills through our programs.', image: '/Images/blog-2.jpg', date: 'March 12, 2024', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'Success Stories', }, ]; const recentPosts = [ { id: 3, title: 'Cultural Immersion Through Language', excerpt: 'Discover how our language programs create authentic cultural experiences and global connections.', image: '/Images/blog-3.jpg', date: 'March 10, 2024', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'Cultural Exchange', }, { id: 4, title: 'Mastering French: A Step-by-Step Guide', excerpt: 'Practical tips and techniques for achieving natural French pronunciation and fluency.', image: '/Images/blog-4.jpg', date: 'March 8, 2024', author: 'Flency Atswenje', category: 'French Language', }, { id: 5, title: 'German Language Essentials', excerpt: 'A comprehensive guide to understanding and mastering German grammar and vocabulary.', image: '/Images/blog-5.jpg', date: 'March 5, 2024', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'German Language', }, ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Blog

Insights, tips, and stories from our language learning community

{/* Featured Posts */}

Featured Articles

{featuredPosts.map((post) => (
{post.date} • {post.category}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

By {post.author}
))}
{/* Recent Posts */}

Recent Articles

{recentPosts.map((post) => (
{post.date} • {post.category}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

By {post.author}
))}
{/* Newsletter Section */}

Subscribe to Our Newsletter

Stay updated with the latest language learning tips, events, and success stories

); }; export default Blog;
